org.fudgemsg
Class FudgeStreamEncoder

java.lang.Object
  org.fudgemsg.FudgeStreamEncoder

public class FudgeStreamEncoder
extends java.lang.Object

Writes Fudge objects to streams. In general, you should not use this class directly. See FudgeContext instead.
